Ultimate goal is not to identify what the milestones will be. You might not know all of them, b…
segments.summary: There are going to be a number of these steps that everyone will have to follow and have to clearly identify with the long arching. Ultimate goal is not to identify what the milestones will be. You might not know all of them, but you have to have some idea about the intervals at which you are going
